description: Looking for an "ordinary shirt" that can keep up with all of your adventures? The year-round Men's Merino Short Sleeve Tee is up to the challenge. With our Core Spun technology, we've wrapped Merino around a nylon core for added durability while still keeping the comfort of ultra-soft, responsibly sourced Merino next to skin. Built for consistent comfort, even when wearing a pack, this shirt is ready to explore the world on your back.
name: Smartwool Merino 150 SS Tee - Mens
